West_Palm_Beach.Good Samaritan Medical Center (West Palm:
Good Samaritan Medical Center or Good Samaritan Hospital is a 333-bed acute care hospital located in West Palm Beach, FL.


== History ==
The hospital opened in May 1920, replacing "Emergency Hospital" (which dated from about 1914), with 35 beds located on 12th street near the lakefront. (now Palm Beach Lakes Boulevard) and Dixie Highway. Dr.
